action_title: Retain dead wood in forest management
key_messages:
Key Messages:
We have found no evidence on the impact of retaining dead wood in forests or woodlands on wild bee communities or populations.
Â 'No evidence' for an action means we have not yet found any studies that directly and quantitatively tested this action during our systematic journal and report searches. Therefore we have been unable to assess whether or not the action is effective or has any harmful impacts. Please get in touch if you know of such a study for this action.
